title: New: The Neighbourhood – Female Robbery
content:
Every once in a while a near-perfect pop track comes along, and causes sizable sections of the blogosphere to self-destruct in a mess of cliches, overzealous comparisons and Twitter hashtags.

This debut track from California’s The Neighbourhood is set to wreak carnage amongst the aforementioned group of socially awkward, Lana-loving bloggers (myself included). With a beat that Miss Del Rey herself would be proud of, and a vocal delivery akin to everyone’s favourite sleaze-bag, The Weeknd, Female Robbery is one hell of a debut track. Aside from one slight slip up around the 1.45 mark, it’s fairly easy to see how this gem has already been featured on Radio 1 and NME. Check out Female Robbery below, and grab a free download while you can.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
